sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { BookOpen, Target, TrendingUp, Clock, CheckCircle, Circle } from 'lucide-react'; import './SkillsGap.css'; const SkillsGap = () => { const [skillsGap, setSkillsGap] = useState(null); const [selectedCareer, setSelectedCareer] = useState(''); useEffect(() => { const savedResults = localStorage.getItem('assessmentResults'); if (savedResults) { const data = JSON.parse(savedResults); setSkillsGap(data.skillsGap); if (data.recommendations.length > 0) { setSelectedCareer(data.recommendations[0].title); } } }, []); if (!skillsGap) { return (

No Skills Gap Analysis Available

Complete your career assessment to see personalized skills gap analysis.

); } const currentCareer = skillsGap.careers.find(c => c.title === selectedCareer); return (

Skills Gap Analysis

Identify the skills you need to develop for your target career

{currentCareer && (
{currentCareer.currentSkills}
Current Skills
{currentCareer.requiredSkills}
Required Skills
{currentCareer.gapSkills}
Skills to Learn
{currentCareer.matchPercentage}%
Current Match

Acquired Skills

{currentCareer.acquiredSkills.map(skill => (
{skill}
))}

Skills Gap

{currentCareer.missingSkills.map(skill => (
{skill}
))}

Recommended Learning Path

{currentCareer.learningPath.map((step, index) => (
{index + 1}

{step.skill}

{step.description}

{step.duration} {step.resource}
))}

Your Action Plan

High Priority

Focus on core technical skills first

Medium Priority

Develop industry-specific knowledge

Low Priority

Enhance soft skills and leadership

)}
); }; export default SkillsGap;
